channel.title: Statistics on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on ZAP

item.title: Active Scan Rule Stats Last Month
item.description:
This page shows the statistics for the top 30 (by alert count) Active Scan rules last month. You can sort on any column - just click on the column headers.

For more details on what the stats mean see the blog post: Monthly Active Scan Rule Statistics

Alert Status Alert Count False Positive % Average Time in Secs
User Agent Fuzzer release 38970363 0.091 127
Hidden File Found release 756880 0.037 50
Cookie Slack Detector beta 602387 0.044 10
Proxy Disclosure beta 564128 0.003 51
CORS Header beta 297992 0.003 35
Anti-CSRF Tokens Check beta 269393 0.583 11
Backup File Disclosure beta 266833 0.539 24
.htaccess Information Leak release 252879 0.002 11
SQL Injection release 239949 0.196 155
XSLT Injection release 229525 0.229 58
GET for POST release 197100 0 11
Directory Browsing release 171309 0 45
SQL Injection - SQLite release 170079 0.027 34
Insecure HTTP Method beta 89243 0.003 11
Cross Site Scripting (Reflected) release 88308 0.014 57
Cloud Metadata Potentially Exposed release 81758 0.043 6
Path Traversal release 76638 0.025 217
SQL Injection - Oracle release 68847 0.051 34
.env Information Leak release 63506 0.011 12
Relative Path Confusion beta 61124 0 17
Trace.axd Information Leak release 56318 0.014 14
Bypassing 403 beta 46968 0.183 13
HTTPS Content Available via HTTP beta 37269 0 10
Format String Error release 31614 0.621 17
SOAP Action Spoofing beta 28156 0 14
Buffer Overflow release 23894 0.01 12
Integer Overflow Error beta 21711 0.007 20
Spring4Shell release 20570 0.019 43
Source Code Disclosure - File Inclusion beta 17874 0.099 6
Cross Site Scripting (DOM Based) release 14250 0 348

item.title: Highest False Positives Last Month
item.description:
These were the alerts most frequently flagged as false positives using Alert Filters last month.

Note that this does not necessarily mean they are false positives, it could mean that the people using ZAP are not interested in these specific vulnerabilities.

Position Alert Status Rule Type
1 Information Disclosure - Suspicious Comments release Passive
2 Cross-Domain Misconfiguration release Passive
3 X-Content-Type-Options Header Missing release Passive
4 Session ID in URL Rewrite release Passive
5 Cookie without SameSite Attribute release Passive
6 Timestamp Disclosure - Unix release Passive
7 Retrieved from Cache release Passive
8 Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set release Passive
9 Strict-Transport-Security Header release Passive
10 Re-examine Cache-control Directives release Passive
11 User Agent Fuzzer release Active
12 Cross-Domain JavaScript Source File Inclusion release Passive
13 Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens release Passive
14 Anti-clickjacking Header release Passive
15 Loosely Scoped Cookie release Passive
16 HTTP Server Response Header release Passive
17 CSP release Passive
18 Modern Web Application release Passive
19 Cookie No HttpOnly Flag release Passive
20 Permissions Policy Header Not Set beta Passive

item.title: Pie Charts
item.description: Some stats are shown for all pings and for desktop only pings. The desktop pings show a significantly different profile, possibly because many automated ZAP scans run in the cloud and many cloud providers are located in the USA. We also know that quite a few companies run ZAP as a SaaS offering which will also skew the stats.

item.title: Top ZAP Add-Ons Last Month
item.description:
These were the most frequently installed optional add-ons last month.

Note that this does not mean they were the most used add-ons - that is harder to quantify.

Position Add-On Status ID Last Updated
1 Import/Export beta exim 2024-10-07
2 Database alpha database 2024-09-17
3 Requester beta requester 2024-06-28
4 Spider release spider 2024-09-23
5 Authentication Helper beta authhelper 2024-09-02
6 Postman Support alpha postman 2024-05-07
7 Passive scanner rules (beta) beta pscanrulesBeta 2024-09-02
8 Passive Scanner alpha pscan 2024-09-02
9 Active scanner rules (beta) beta ascanrulesBeta 2024-09-24
10 Passive scanner rules (alpha) alpha pscanrulesAlpha 2024-09-02
11 Access Control Testing alpha accessControl 2024-03-25
12 Plug-n-Hack Configuration beta plugnhack 2022-10-27
13 Sequence alpha sequence 2023-10-23
14 gRPC Support alpha grpc 2024-07-02
15 Custom Payloads beta custompayloads 2023-11-10
16 Active scanner rules (alpha) alpha ascanrulesAlpha 2024-09-02
17 Advanced SQLInjection Scanner beta sqliplugin 2021-10-20
18 Technology Detection release wappalyzer 2024-09-24
19 FuzzDB Files release fuzzdb 2022-09-23
20 Python Scripting beta jython 2024-04-11
